data.text: @PittyPat523 @SteveDaines @POTUS There is no red line anymore when it comes to the GOP..

@SteveDaines @POTUS We are not forgetting about this! The people of Israel are good, their government is corrupt  Did you see the new Super Bowl ad on the side of building? Our government is corrupt too https://t.co/6Kf6iHhYdJ
@SteveDaines @POTUS Steve Daines fighting Israel’s wars. Color me unsurprised.
@SteveDaines @POTUS So, your Dear Leader's racist post is still not a red line?
@SteveDaines @POTUS Your silence is fucking deafening Daines! Coward. https://t.co/T5Er3lyTQC

@SteveDaines @POTUS Steve, I can't believe you think Trump is strong.  Making threats is not strength. The inability to admit when one is wrong is not strength.  The inability to considerer consequences is not strength. Strength comes from the ability to negotiate, to garner respect.

@SteveDaines @POTUS Every chant of Reza Pahlavi’s name is a vote cast under threat of death. Iranians are demanding regime change under leadership of Reza Pahlavi. Stand with us. 🙏
#KingRezaPahlavi #RezaPahlaviForIran #FreeIran #IranMassacre #IranRevolution2026
